History.tag: The City Where Two Continents Meet
History.title: ISTANBUL
History.quote: "Istanbul, the city of poets, emperors, and dreamers. A legendary metropolis hiding a separate secret in every layer of history, combining the past and the future in the blue waters of the Bosphorus."
History.section1Desc: A magnificent journey extending from Byzantium founded in the 7th century BC to Constantinople, the "New Rome" of the Roman Empire, and to the Ottoman's Dersaadet. Istanbul has been the capital of three great empires for 1600 years, witnessing sieges, victories, and cultural revolutions that changed the course of history.
History.section1Extra: Prayers echoing in the dome of Hagia Sophia, state secrets whispered in the corridors of Topkapi Palace, and time lost in the labyrinths of the Grand Bazaar... Istanbul is not just a city, it is a living open-air museum.
History.section2Desc: While staying at our Solis City hotel, you will be right in the heart of this magical history. Our special concierge team is ready to make your Istanbul experience unforgettable with events such as the "Historical Peninsula Tour" or "Sunset Boat Tour on the Bosphorus" prepared especially for you.
